programme.title: Live: Isa Soares Tonight
programme.desc: Isa Soares breaks down the day's news.

programme.title: Live: What We Know With Max Foster
programme.desc: Max Foster has a definitive roundup of the day's top stories, giving you the urgent need-to-know context; a deeper dive into the questions sparking debate around the world.

programme.title: Live: Quest Means Business
programme.desc: Richard Quest offers a dynamic look at the day's global business stories.

programme.title: Quest's World of Wonder
programme.desc: Richard Quest is no stranger to Turkey; this time he is looking at the country from a completely different perspective: as seen from the sea; on board a traditional Turkish gulet, he explores the coastline.

programme.title: Live: The Lead With Jake Tapper
programme.desc: Covering all the day's top stories around the country and the globe, from politics to money, sports to popular culture.

programme.title: Live: World Sport
programme.desc: Up-to-the minute sports news, highlights and analysis plus interviews with the biggest names in global sport.

programme.title: Live: The Brief with Jim Sciutto
programme.desc: The best of CNN's reporting from correspondents across the world, to guide global audiences through the fast-paced news cycle with insight, analysis and hard-hitting interviews.

programme.title: Live: Erin Burnett OutFront
programme.desc: Erin Burnett stays ahead of the headlines, delivering a show that's in-depth and informative.

programme.title: Live: Anderson Cooper 360
programme.desc: Anderson Cooper goes beyond the headlines with in-depth reporting and investigations; Anderson keeps his commitment to holding those in power accountable; joining him are guests that frequently include political and legal analysts.

programme.title: Live: The Source With Kaitlan Collins
programme.desc: Kaitlan Collins is chasing the facts, asking the tough questions and connecting with her sources.

programme.title: Live: CNN NewsNight With Abby Phillip
programme.desc: Abby Phillip leads a roundtable discussion on the day's biggest stories and issues shaping our world.

programme.title: Laura Coates Live
programme.desc: Laura Coates goes inside the story with a relentless pursuit of the facts.

programme.title: Live: The Story Is With Elex Michaelson
programme.desc: Elex Michaelson tackles the breaking stories making headlines with sharp analysis, fresh perspective, and a dose of humor.
